backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles and per-user manga CRUD storage with pagination support.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for multiple frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React application entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing authentication, profile setup flow, and rendering the manga list.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginLogout: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting first‑time users to enter a display name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout wrapper providing header, footer, and main content structure.
frontend/src/components/manga/AddMangaDi: Dialog for creating manga entries with manual and checkbox genres, validation, and image handling.
frontend/src/components/manga/CoverImage: Provides UI to add, upload, preview, and remove cover images, supporting URLs, file uploads, and showing upload progress.
Renders a compact manga card showing cover, title, rating, progress, status, and genres.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaListP: Displays a paginated manga list with loading states and an option to add new manga entries.
frontend/src/components/manga/Pagination: Renders pagination buttons with ellipsis logic and previous/next navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAllMangaEntries.ts: Fetches all manga entries once an authenticated actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides hooks to fetch and update the current user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibraryGenres.ts: Computes a sorted list of unique genres from all manga entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaMutations.ts: Defines mutations to add, update, and delete manga entries while invalidating pagination queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaPage.ts: Fetches a specific paginated manga page based on the current page number.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables, dark mode overrides, and custom gold utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with plugins, custom colors tied to CSS variables, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current feature set and metadata, outlining implemented IC authentication, profile, manga UI, and build capabilities.
